Articles.Content:
I watch this show unfold

My comedy show
Your comedy show is interrupted by a horrible joke. Everyone but you leaves. Your lonely "comedy" show.
Lone mime's show.

It's very quiet...

Until [@Spacetraindriver](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/149403-spacetraindriver/) makes a good joke and the mime laughs.

"What do you call a 747 Deeamlifter?"

...

"Pregnant!"

Mime laughs and the audience comes back and bursts into laughter.

My profitable comedy show.

> 
> 
> 21 minutes ago, Benjamin Kerman said:
> 
> 
> Until [@Spacetraindriver](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/149403-spacetraindriver/) makes a good joke
> 

Thank you! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

I continue watching the comedy show and buy the exclusive rights to the television broadcasts, making me millions.

My rich empire, Our planet, and My grand Navy
Dark, nighty hill stays forgotten

I move the comedy show out doors to the hill.

My less-profitable-but-still-more-much-more-than-decent-paying Comedy show.

"Who was the C-97 in a relationship with to give birth to multiple rockets?"

Comedy show is cancelled in favor of Puddles Pity Party

<iframe allowfullscreen="true" frameborder="0" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ItXygU9SJCA?feature=oembed" width="480"></iframe>

My sad-clown show

**Edited <time datetime="2017-03-04T23:12:53Z" title="03/04/2017 11:12  PM" data-short="7 yr">March 4, 2017</time> by Xorth Tanovar**

I sue them with my money and get my show back.

"Man, that show had a shipload of money, unfortunately that ship was a 4 funneled ocean liner from 1912!"

I wait for everyone to get distracted by things that are not hills, and then I sneak in and claim the hill.

My hill.

I use a teaspoon and slowly dig your hill away into my own lump of dirt over the course of a year.

My lump.

I make a critical spelling error.

My hell.

> 
> 
> 5 hours ago, eloquentJane said:
> 
> 
> I wait for everyone to get distracted by things that are not hills, and then I sneak in and claim the hill.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> My hill.
> 

> 
> 
> On 3/2/2017 at 4:01 PM, Spacetraindriver said:
> 
> 
> I move the comedy show out doors to the hill.
>

I attend the comedy show and make some memes.

My memes

I reply after you and take your memes.

I then lock the memes in a safely gaured set of cadacombs.

I storm Paris and retake the catacombs

My Roman Empire
My army takes it back.

Meanwhile my comedy show is moved to a bunker in the hill.

"Ironically it's the fears of the depths are now above us!"

Your lack of movie references offends me, inciting me to leave the comedy club and found my own hill.

My second hill

**Edited <time datetime="2017-03-05T21:41:12Z" title="03/05/2017 09:41  PM" data-short="7 yr">March 5, 2017</time> by Mr. Me**

Suddenly all sounds disappear around.

Silent hill.

Starts playing some music.

Loud Hill.

(Suddenly numerous eyes open on this hill and its neighbors.)

The hills have eyes.

I poke their eyes out.

My hill.

Suddenly you see something squared on the ground.  

You clean an old strange road sign and read: "D...u...n...w...i...c...h"

[Sentinel Hill](http://lovecraft.wikia.com/wiki/Sentinel_Hill)
